metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5316 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Dotclear before 2.6.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted page.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5316` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dotclear - 2.6.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dotclear package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.4+dfsg-1').
